form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES, Form approved. OMB No 4-0052.

full_text: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved. OMB No. 43-R0052, Immigration and Naturalization Service FEE STAMP APPLICATION FOR ISSUANCE OR EXTENSION OF PERMIT TO REENTER THE UNITED STATES JAN 21 1975 as provided in section 223 of the Immigration and Nationality Act Use typewriter or print in block letters with ball-point pen. issuance I hereby apply for (check one) of Permit to Reenter the United States extension FAMILY NAME (Capital Letters) FIRST MIDDLE IMPORTANT: You must submit your Alien Registration Receipt 1. YOUR NAME WU Chi-Su Card with this application if you checked 'Issuance'' above. C/O IN CARE OF If you checked Extension' you must submit the reentry per- mit you wish to have extended. (No and Street) (Apt.No.) MAILING 4 Sage Hill Lane, Menands ALIEN REGISTRATION NUMBER ADDRESS (City) (State) IN U.S. New York Y. 12204 (ZIP Code) A- 19 320 867 FILL IN ITEMS 2 THROUGH 6 ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR ISSUANCE OF REENTRY PERMIT 2. DATE OF BIRTH(Month, Day. Year) COUNTRY OF BIRTH COUNTRY OF CLAIMED NATIONALITY COLOR OF EYES COLOR OF HAIR 02-08-1914 China China Dark Brown Black HEIGHT 5 FEET INCHES VISIBLE MARKS AND SCARS None 3. I DID DID NOT REGISTER FOR SELECTIVE SERVICE 4. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO first ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE OR ADJUSTMENT TO PERMANENT RESIDENT STATUS NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED OR ADJUSTED PORT OF ARRIVAL OR LOCATION OF DATE OF ARRIVAL OR DATE AS OF IMMIGRATION OFFICE WHICH WHICH ADJUSTMENT OF STATUS GRANTED ADJUSTMENT WAS GRANTED FILL IN REMAINING ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK ONLY IF YOU DID NOT ACQUIRE PERMANENT RESIDENCE THROUGH ADJUSTMENT. MANNER OF FIRST ARRIVAL IN UNITED STATES FOR PERMANENT RESIDENCE (Name of Vessel, Airline, etc.) FATHER'S NAME AT TIME OF YOUR ARRIVAL MOTHER'S MAIDEN NAME 5. FILL IN THE ITEMS IN THIS BLOCK AS TO last ARRIVAL IN U.S. (Exclude any re-entry after an absence of less than six months Canada o Mexico.) NAME UNDER WHICH ADMITTED PORT OF ARRIVAL DATE OF ARRIVAL NAME OF VESSEL, AIRLINE OR OTHER MEANS OF CONVEYANCE: 6. PORT OF proposed DEPARTURE FROM UNITED STATES DATE OF proposed DEPARTURE LENGTH OF INTENDED ABSENCE ABROAD NAME OF TRANSPORTATION COMPANY IF DEPARTURE IS TO BE BY VESSEL, GIVE NAME OF VESSEL FILL IN ITEM 7, ONLY IF APPLICATION IS FOR EXTENSION OF REENTRY PERMIT 7. List all countries visited since your last departure from the United States, in the order visited DATE & PORT OF LAST DEPARTURE FROM U.S. April 10, 1974 Taiwan Los Angeles 8. FILL IN ITEM 8 ONLY IF YOU HAVE PREVIOUSLY OBTAINED A PERMIT TO REENTER ISSUANCE DATE OF LAST PERMIT LOCATION OF IMMIGRATION AND INATURALIZATION OFFICE ISSUING LAST PERMIT MY LAST PERMIT (City and State) IS ATTACHED April 5, 1974 New York IS NOT ATTACHED IF THE PERMIT IS NOT ATTACHED, STATE REASON: IF PERMIT IS ATTACHED, STATE EXPIRATION DATE April 5, 1975 ALL APPLICANTS MUST FILL IN ITEMS 9 THROUGH 20, INCLUSIVE 9. PRESENT OCCUPATION: None NAME and ADDRESS OF EMPLOYER SOCIAL SECURITY ACCOUNT NUMBER 388-70-9424 None 10. MAILING ADDRESS ABROAD (Number and Street) (City/Town) (State/Province/District) (Country) No. 10/3, Lane 44, Kin Men Street, Taipei Taiwan Republic of China 11. COUNTRIES TO BE VISITED (List each country) USA, Japan, Hongkong felse 12. REASONS FOR GOING ABROAD OR SEEKING EXTENSION (Be concise and complete): I request for one-year extension, to April 5, 1976. My youngest son, John C.T. Wu, now doing graduate studies in USA, will receive Ph.D. degree in Oct. or Nov., 1975. He will RECEIVED TRANS IN RET'D-TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM 1-131 (REV. 6-1-73) N OVER
